markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Tooth Fairy](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1344)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Lone fairies usually need several minutes of elbow grease and a sleeping or restrained subject to extract a tooth.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/ToothFairy.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Tooth Fairy](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1344)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Fey" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=69" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 273</row>

**Perception** +6; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -2

**Dex** +3

**Con** +0

**Int** -1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
pliers

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +2 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +4 

</row>

**HP** 8

**Weaknesses**
[cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) 2

**Plaque Burst** When killed, a tooth fairy bursts into sticky, foul-smelling white dust. Each creature with 5 feet must succeed at a DC 16 Fortitude save or become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (sickened 2 on a critical failure).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 10 feet, fly 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
pliers +7 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6 bludgeoning plus Tooth Tug

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 13
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177)
- **1st**
[Sleep](/Spells.aspx?ID=288)

**Tooth Tug** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** The tooth fairy's last action was a successful pliers Strike against a creature with teeth; **Effect** The tooth fairy tugs on the creature's teeth, dealing 2 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) to the creature.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-270" />
name: Tooth Fairy
